title: FloTool 10714MX3 Super Funnel Trio
description: FloTool, by Hopkins Manufacturing, offers the most comprehensive and highest quality offering of fluid handling products. Driven by innovative, no-mess product solutions, whether you're changing your oil, topping off the antifreeze or checking all your automotive fluid levels, FloTool has the right application. FloTool' s Super Multi-Purpose Funnel is perfect for transmissions, oil, and other engine fluids. FloTool introduces this new 3-piece funnel set that will make all of your fluid application processes a breeze. These three very different funnels will ensure that you have the tool to get the job done right. Comes with a 90-day FloTool warranty with proof of purchase.
